# Logs
logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
pnpm-debug.log*
lerna-debug.log*

node_modules
dist
dist-ssr
*.local

# Editor directories and files
.vscode/*
!.vscode/extensions.json
.idea
.DS_Store
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.sw?
# Ignore build output
/dist/

# Ignore node_modules
/node_modules/

# Ignore cache files generated by gh-pages
/node_modules/.cache/

# Ignore IDE/editor specific files
.idea/
.vscode/
